It’s insane that this place is rated under 4 stars. For pizza in Korea, this place easily deserves 4.5-5 stars. My only suggestion is to replace the silverware. While the silverware is very pretty, it’s extremely hard to roll up pasta using the fork due to its thin cylindrical shape, which makes it hard to grip the heavy pasta. Other than that, the food was great, and I highly recommend checking this place out, especially if you’re looking for good pizza. 접기
